---
title: "Secret Santa Randomizer using ShinyLive 🎅🎄🎁"
date: '11/19/2023'
image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1603793303277-ed67787545e5?q=80&w=3870&auto=format&fit=crop&ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8fA%3D%3D'
---


It's the time of year for giving 🎅🎄🎁

The purpose of this post is to showcase a simple Secret Santa Randomizer built using [Shiny](https://www.rstudio.com/products/shiny/), the [bslib](https://rstudio.github.io/bslib/) dashboard framework, and [ShinyLive](https://shinylive.io/r/examples/) (a server-less Shiny implementation).

The source code for this application can be found [here](https://github.com/mluu921/secret-santa).
